attributes.action: Creat a coalition government of ALL parties.
attributes.additional_details:
All parties working together as one would be more effective and public trust would grow for this multi party government...

Once we get through this covid-19 crisis the normal elections should begin as normal in the future..
attributes.background: This government should end and all the uk parties should work together as a single government to get us through covid-19.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551504
